title: Installation issue: cmake@2.9.6 failed to built with libuv@1.25.0
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack uninstall -y --all --dependents cmake; spack uninstall -y --all --dependents libuv; spack spec cmake@3.9.6 %gcc@4.8.5; spack install cmake@3.9.6 %gcc@4.8.5
...
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux mu05.pi.sjtu.edu.cn 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 22 16:42:41 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information

`git bisect` shows that #10423 introduces this issue in which `libuv` was bump from v1.9.0 to v1.25.0. 

A workaround is to built cmake@3.9.6 with libuv@1.9.0 dependency.

```
spack install cmake@3.9.6 %gcc@4.8.5 ^libuv@1.9.0
```
